name: Hardest 1980s Movies, Part One Trivia Quiz | 1980s Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: In the 1985 film "The Legend of Billie Jean", what was the name of the character played by Christian Slater?
questions.explanation:
Binx.

	This 1985 movie centers around a group of teenagers  who are on the run from the law in Corpus Christy, Texas.  Helen Slater and Christian Slater star.  They are not related, in fact it has been reported that Christian Slater had a crush on Helen during filming.

questions.text: What was the name of the fraternity that Louis and Gilbert tried to pledge in "Revenge of the Nerds" (1984)?
questions.explanation:
Alpha Beta.

	They tried pledging Alpha Beta but the initiation process was horrible so they decided to start their own fraternity.

questions.text: What kind of earrings did Keith buy Amanda Jones in "Some Kind of Wonderful" (1987)?
questions.explanation:
Diamond.

	He bought these earrings for her but she did not accept them.  They went to Watts (Mary Stuart Masterson) which is who he ended up with in the film.

questions.text: What was the name of the fast food restaurant that Roger (Casey Siemaszko) worked at in "Secret Admirer" (1985)?
questions.explanation:
The Dancing Burger.

	You can catch the name of this when Toni and Michael are in the drive through before Toni thrashes Roger's van.

questions.text: How much did the necklace that Gary bought Karen cost, in "The Last American Virgin" (1982)?
questions.explanation:
$80.00

	He bought the necklace for her birthday. He had it inscribed to say, "To Karen, With Love".  When he went to her party he saw that she was kissing her old boyfriend so he left.

questions.text: What kind of store did Julie's parents own in "Valley Girl" (1983)?
questions.explanation:
Health Food Store.

	They were totally into health foods.  They were still living life like it was in the 1960's.

questions.text: Which of the following 80's films starred Phoebe Cates?
questions.explanation:
"Fast Times at Ridgemont High" and "Shag".

	She starred as Linda Barrett in "Fast Times at Ridgemont High" (1982) and as Carson McBride in "Shag" (1989).  She had a hiatus from film work from 1995 to 2000.  She made her return to film work along side her co-star from "Fast Times at Ridgemont High", Jennifer Jason Leigh, in "The Anniversary Party" (2001).

questions.text: Which famous film star portrayed Ernie "Slam" Webster in the 1984 film "Grandview, U.S.A."?
questions.explanation:
Patrick Swayze.

	Patrick Swayze starred in this 1984 drama about a boy's life in a small town after he graduates high school.  Also starring are Jamie Lee Curtis, C. Thomas Howell, and John Cusack.

questions.text: In the 1984 movie "Night of the Comet", what candy was Reggie eating before she got locked out of the movie theater?
questions.explanation:
Twizzlers.

	This 1984 flick is about a comet that literally destroys the human race.  Catherine Mary Stewart who portrayed Regina Belmont also starred in the 1989 movie "Weekend at Bernie's".

questions.text: In the 1984 movie "Footloose", what Foreigner song do Ren and Ariel dance to in the bar that they go to with Rusty and Willard?
questions.correct: Waiting for a Girl Like You
options: I Wanna Know What Love Is
questions.explanation:
Waiting for a Girl Like You.

	This Foreigner song was not on the original soundtrack for the film.  It was added along with "Hurt So Good" by John Mellencamp; and "Bang Your Head" by Quiet Riot on the remastered version of the soundtrack.
